About.DESCRIPTION_3439f8f9-0010-4d60-ba8b-5a01: This is a simple profile with minimum configurations for Get Started.

EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Hosts where the data come from. Format: host-name[:port] or ip-address[:port]

EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Whether to search PV name in local network.

Default TDL Files.DESCRIPTION: Open these tdl files after run.

Default Search Paths.DESCRIPTION: Look for the tdl files in these paths on local disks. Web path is not recognized.

Editable.DESCRIPTION: If the default TDL files and the TDL opened from them are editable.

Manually Opened TDL Editable.DESCRIPTION: If the manually opened TDL files and the TDL opened from them are editable.

Manually Opened TDL Mode.DESCRIPTION: The manually opened TDL files' mode.

Log file.DESCRIPTION: Logs of this profile are written to this file. If empty, the logs are output to default output device.

Video Saving Folder.DESCRIPTION: Save video files to this folder. Default is HOME dir.

Image Saving Folder.DESCRIPTION: Automatically save image files to this folder. Default is HOME dir.

Python Command.DESCRIPTION: The python command for running script attached to the display window. You can add options to it.
